acerca-de-mi.presentacion:
I have always been passionate about logic, practicality, and research, thanks to my background in healthcare.
I am characterized by my interest in learning, my autonomy in learning, my curiosity, and my interest in improving my skills. That's why I know web development is where I belong.

card--experience.exp__redact:
Personal Project: Plant Care Manager (2024 - Present)
Full-stack development of a web application for managing the care of domestic plants. The application will allow users to register plants and receive maintenance reminders. Implementation of the user interface using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Creation of server logic and database using XAMPP and MySQL.
card--experience.exp__redact-2:
Game: TicTacToe. (2025)
Development of an interactive Tic-Tac-Toe game in Java using NetBeans. Implementation of turn-based logic, win/draw detection, and a basic user interface. Technologies used: Java, NetBeans.
